actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to ensure that each Federal agency participating in the International Trade Data System develops and maintains the necessary information technology infrastructure to support the operation of the System, and for other purposes.
short_title: Reducing Waste and Increasing Efficiency in Trade Act

titles.title: Reducing Waste and Increasing Efficiency in Trade Act

To amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to ensure that each Federal agency participating in the International Trade Data System develops and maintains the necessary information technology infrastructure to support the operation of the System, and for other purposes.
